Posts.Content: Dec 16, 2011 07:57PM Jean0078 wrote: I have about the same diagnosis as you. ER and PR+ 11/15 nodes and Stage 3 6cm. I have one ovary left as had a hysterectomy pre-menopausal and OBGYN left one ovary so I woiuldn't go into immediate menopause. My oncologist recomends I get that ovary taken out- but no rush, just sometime in 2012. I just finished chemo and start rads and Arimedix next month. That was his opinion and I am going with it. Am shooting for May sometime.
Posts.Title: Removing Ovaries CherylinOhio cinnamonsmiles

Posts.Content: Feb 19, 2012 07:04PM Jean0078 wrote: My Dr, said I had a 12 week window to start radiation after chemo. I took 7. Worked well as I was recovered from the chemo pretty well by then.
